flavor: You trace your dwarven ancestry to Clan Namarforge, ruling house of ancient Sarphil (a lost dwarven kingdom that once flourished beneath the West Galena Mountains along Vaasa’s southern border). As one of the few remaining Vault-Wardens, you are charged to navigate and maintain “the Lost Ways,” a vast network of winding tunnels which delve far beneath the Moondeep Sea.
name: Vault-warden Of The Lost Ways
